title: #207/Sarasota FL: Architect Guy Peterson + Musical Guest Heather Rigdon + Frank Harmon
description: In Sarasota, Florida, one of the east coast’s finest centers for Modernism, names like Paul Rudolph, Gene Leedy, Victor Lundy, Tim Siebert, and Jack West dominated the design scene from the 1940’s through the 1980’s.  Then came a new generation of architects that took things to a whole new level.  One of those, Guy Peterson, joins us from Sarasota.  Later on, returning musical guest Heather Rigdon, then a few minutes with Frank Harmon.
